diff_analysis.evidence: The patch primarily adds stronger validation (ArrayData::validate_full, offset and bounds checks, UTF-8 validation, dictionary index bounds checks) and refactors code to avoid unnecessary mutable borrows. All unsafe slices and typed_data usages are guarded by explicit size checks (e.g., typed_offsets, check_bounds asserts and length checks). New tests exercise failure paths but do not introduce runtime behavior. No added code performs unchecked buffer copies, unbounded allocations, or dereferences of potentially null pointers. Therefore, none of the listed CWEs are introduced by the new code.
